scenario_text.value:
Those Shadows didn’t stand a chance! You’ve
come a long way since we first met.
I’m glad we’re on the same side.

I wonder... Could we have gotten Archnemon
or Piemon to fight alongside us, too?

No, I don’t think so. They never believed in
the bond between us and our fated children.

I know because that’s how I felt too. Until
reuniting with Akiharu, that is.
Well, we’re glad to have you, Gabumon.

Anyway, no point dwelling on what mighta
been. Let’s focus on what comes next.

Right. We need to hurry up and find the
Master.

It’s our only option. Let’s not drag this
out.
